turkishSentence: Kız kardeşim iki dakika önce dişlerini fırçaladı.
englishSentence: My sister brushed her teeth two minutes ago.
Greg played so well yesterday.
They helped their mother yesterday.
She called me yesterday.

turkishSentence: Susan köpeğini iki gün önce gezdirdi.
englishSentence: Susan walked her dog two days ago.
We washed our car last month.

turkishSentence: Amcam üç yıl önce sigarayı bıraktı.
englishSentence: My uncle stopped smoking three years ago.

turkishSentence: Küçük bebek bir saat önce çok ağladı.
englishSentence: The little baby cried a lot an hour ago.
I studied English last year.
John and Jessie liked their teacher.
My brother planned a trip to Europe.
You passed your exams.
I watered the flowers.
None of my friends supported me.
He talked to me silently.
My mother kept her jewels in her safe.
I chose to stay at home on my birthday.

turkishSentence: Teyzeme Noel için bir kartpostal gönderdim.
englishSentence: I sent a postcard to my aunt for Christmas.

turkishSentence: Çok fazla şeker yedikten sonra kendini kötü hissetti.
englishSentence: He felt terrible after eating too much sugar.
They swam for a long time.

turkishSentence: Sarah partiye biraz içki ve cips getirdi.
englishSentence: Sarah brought some drinks and chips to the party.

turkishSentence: Kız kardeşim geçen yıl iki kitap yazdı.
englishSentence: My sister wrote two books last year.

turkishSentence: Kediyi yakalamak için onun peşinden koştular.
englishSentence: They ran after the cat to catch it.
He understood everything.
We forgot to buy cheese.
You drank too much coffee yesterday.
My friends slept in their car after the earthquake.
The train left early.
My son flew to San Francisco yesterday.
I took a shower two hours ago.
They lived in Paris.
She read the newspaper yesterday.
I didn't watch TV.
He didn 't study for the exam.
Did he call you?
Did I forget something?
What time did the film start?
He had a shower.
Why did you come?
Did he go to the party?
We stayed in Germany for three weeks.
I didn't want to go to the theatre.
Did they go to the match last night?

turkishSentence: Teyzesi hastayken, Sean onu hastanede ziyaret etti.
englishSentence: Sean visited his aunt in hospital when she was ill.

turkishSentence: Aile bize yiyecek ve içecek verdi.
englishSentence: The family gave us some food and drink.

turkishSentence: Çete, şehir merkezindeki iki banka soydu.
englishSentence: The gang robbed two banks in the town centre.

turkishSentence: Yemeğinizi beğendin mi? (beğeniyor muydun?) Hayır, beğenmedim (beğenmiyordum).
englishSentence: Did you like your meal? No, I didn't.
With who did you go on holiday with?

turkishSentence: Annem Kanada'ya tek başına seyahat etti.
englishSentence: My mum travelled to Canada on her own.

turkishSentence: Kız kardeşime doğum günü için bir şiir yazdım.
englishSentence: I wrote a poem for my sister for her birthday.
Did you read that book?
I dreamt about you last night!
Where did you go to school?
When did she arrive?

turkishSentence: Neden bu kadar çok yemek yedi?
englishSentence: Why did he eat so much?
What did they do yesterday?
Who did you meet at the party?
How did she come to work this morning?
Where did I leave my glasses?

turkishSentence: Dün gece eve ne zaman geldi?
englishSentence: When did he get home last night?

turkishSentence: Dün annemin en sevdiği vazoyu kırdın.
englishSentence: You broke my mother's favorite vase yesterday.

turkishSentence: Geçen hafta yeni bir araba satın aldım.
englishSentence: I bought a new car last week.

turkishSentence: Anneme doğum günü için çiçek verdim.
englishSentence: I gave my mother some flowers for her birthday.
I became a teacher.
He told me the answer of the second question.
How did they go to work?
Sam didn't talk much.
When did you arrive home?

turkishSentence: Kardeşim bilgisayarlar hakkında çok şey bildi. (biliyordu)
englishSentence: My brother knew a lot about computers.
We went to church on Sunday.
She didn 't study enough for the exam.
Did your sister catch the plane?
They didn 't like the meals.

turkishSentence: Cathy geçen hafta çamaşır yıkadı mı?
englishSentence: Did Cathy do the laundry last week?

turkishSentence: Bay Green dün ne zaman kalktı?
englishSentence: When did Mr. Green get up yesterday?

turkishSentence: Joseph ne zaman garip bir ses duydu?
englishSentence: When did Joseph hear a strange noise?

Why did it rain on my birthday?

turkishSentence: Geçen hafta dersten sonra nereye gitti?
englishSentence: Where did he go after the class last week?
What did I do last Tuesday?
When did you start your job?
